text: ‘Arau tumi tomara lakhutidala niksepa karaa’. Tara pichata yetiya te'om se'i lakhutidalaka sapara darae keramera karaa dekha pale tetiya te'om picha homhaka di lara maraibalai dharaile arau ubhati nedekhile. (Allahe ka’le) ‘he mucha! Bhaya nakaraiba, niscaya mora ocarata raachulasakale bhaya napaya
